column4: hello everyone i have a rather urgent problem id like to see if anyone can help me with.  i am dual booting vista and ubuntu.....i was trying to install mandriva next to those.......but now my pc wont boot......i get some grub 17 error and thats it, also when i go into gparted it reports that the disk is completely empty with unallocated space....any ideas?
